reviewText:
Finally ... complete seasons of Classic Doctor Who. And they're CODEFREE (PAL though)
The German publisher Pandastorm Pictures is releasing the seventh Doctor's adventures.

The "siebter Doctor Volume 2" DVD boxed set contains the complete season 25 on 5 DVDs:

Disc 1: Die Hand des Omega ( Remembrance of the Daleks)
Disc 2: The Davros Connections (Bonus)
Disc 3: Die Macht der Frhlichkeit (The Happiness Patrol)
Disc 4: Das Vermchtnis der Nemesis (Silver Nemesis)
Disc 5: Die Todesmanege auf Segonax ( The Greatest Show in the Galaxy)

language: English, German
subtitles: English, German

Bonus Material: EVERYTHING the UK DVDs contain (minus the soon on DVD trailers)

Yes, booklet, cover (and easy to navigate) menu are in German, but you can easily watch the episodes and the bonus in English (even with subtitles) ... simply go to "Einstellungen" and select "Englisch" :-)
